page.title: 08Bus Service
page.content:
The bus service in the{Kilbride area is mainly run by the {Ulsterbus company which is the largest bus company in Northern Ireland. All the buses that are used to service the Kilbride area all work from the Ballyclare Ulsterbus Depot.
As Kilbride is mainly a farming area the people in that area do not need as much {transport}as they would in a big town. Eight buses are used.
The main use of the bus{service}is taking the children to and from school in Ballyclare.
Without a bus service it would be hard to get to one place and back without a car.
